title: Address details
cannotFindAddress: Ni allaf ddod o hyd i’r cyfeiriad yn y rhestr
pageText: Dylai’r cyfeiriad fod ar eich slipiau cyflog, contract neu ddogfennau swyddogol eraill.
insetText: This should be the same respondent address given to Acas. - Requires Update
manualAddress: The respondent address is outside the UK - Requires Update

addressPostcode.invalid: Enter a valid postcode. For example, SW1 1AA - Requires Update
addressPostcode.required: Enter a postcode. For example, SW1 1AA - Requires Update

respondentAddress1.required: Enter the first line of the respondent address - up to 100 characters - Requires Update
respondentAddress1.invalid: Enter a valid first line of the respondent address - up to 100 characters - Requires Update

respondentAddress2.required: Enter the second line of the respondent address - up to 50 characters - Requires Update
respondentAddress2.invalid: Enter a valid second line of the respondent address - up to 50 characters - Requires Update

respondentAddressTown.required: Enter a town or city for the respondent address - up to 50 characters - Requires Update
respondentAddressTown.invalid: Enter a valid town or city for the respondent address - up to 50 characters - Requires Update

respondentAddressCountry.required: Enter a country for the respondent address - up to 50 characters - Requires Update
respondentAddressCountry.invalid: Enter a valid country for the respondent address - up to 50 characters - Requires Update

respondentAddressPostcode.required: Enter a postcode. For example, SW1 1AA - Requires Update
respondentAddressPostcode.invalid: Enter a valid postcode. For example, SW1 1AA - Requires Update
